articles.title: 32 Affordable Beauty Products Reviewers Love
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Gold Bond launched a firming neck and chest cream formulated with aloe, salicylic acid, and jojoba oil. Olay introduced the Super Serum Body Wash packed with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides. E.l.f. released the Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara which uses lightweight tubing technology. Mixsoon introduced Bean SPF 50 Sunscreen with an ~airy~ texture.

articles.title: Galaxy Z Fold 7: Reasons to be Excited
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: The article discusses the anticipated features of the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7, including an improved hinge mechanism for enhanced durability, a more powerful processor, and camera upgrades with improved sensor technology and video recording capabilities. The phone is expected to feature a larger battery with faster charging and improved wireless charging, as well as software enhancements for a smoother user experience.

articles.title: 43 Things That'll Help You Realize The Handyman Has Been Living In Your House All Along (Psst, It's *You*)
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: The article mentions several new products and services designed to improve homes and rentals. A rechargeable, stick-on LED wall light offers customizable lighting solutions, while renter-friendly Tulip shades provide an easy way to update existing lighting fixtures. Additionally, products like Angry Orange pet odor eliminator, magnetic dishwasher covers, and wood grain tape offer simple and affordable ways to address specific needs and aesthetics in a home.

articles.title: Boots is selling a beauty buy that helps prevent dreaded chafing this summer – it's cheaper than ever
articles.author: Roisin Chapman
articles.summary: Boots promotes the Dermacare Anti-Chafe Powder, priced at £2.40, which is designed to reduce discomfort from rubbing and chafing. This product, containing 95.5% natural ingredients, helps absorb excess moisture, keeping skin dry and soft. Customer reviews indicate its effectiveness in preventing chafing in various areas.

articles.title: 35 Cheap Swaps For More Expensive Products
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: The article highlights various affordable alternative products and services from brands like Catrice, Mise En Scene, Pavoi, Physicians Formula, E.l.f. Cosmetics, Essence, NYX, L'Oréal Paris, and Juno & Co. These products are presented as budget-friendly options comparable to higher-end counterparts, encompassing items such as under-eye brighteners, hair serums, jewelry, glow sticks, sunscreen, bronzing drops, setting sprays, BB creams, lip balms and cleansing balms. The alternative brands launch similar products offering similar experience with low cost.

articles.title: Feed your face with Lush's new skincare range
articles.author: Craig Jones
articles.summary: Lush has launched a new range of 'fresh' skincare products, including face masks, eye pads, cleansers, and facial scrubs, all free from preservatives and containing responsibly sourced fruits and vegetables. The range features innovations like Mrs Whippy face mask, Biomic cleanser, and Dragon Clouds eye pads, designed to address specific skin concerns. The new skincare range is available in Lush shops, online, and via the Lush app.

articles.title: If You're Tired Of TikTok Products, I'm Sorry To Tell You That These 34 Products Are Actually Worth Every Penny
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: E.l.f launched Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara, utilizing lightweight tubing technology. Olay introduced Super Serum Body Wash, packed with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides for 24-hour hydration. Clinique restocked Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm in Black Honey, a cult-classic product.

articles.title: I Thought My Swiffer Mop Was Just Okay — Until I Learned the Right Way to Use It
articles.author: Jenny Hughes
articles.summary: P&G's Swiffer Sweeper 2-in-1 combines the classic dry Swiffer with mopping capabilities. The new Swiffer Sweeper 2-in-1 starter kit includes one sweeper, dry sweeping cloths, and wet mopping cloths, and it is designed to be stronger, collapsible, and easier to use than previous models, offering a quick and convenient cleaning solution for various floor types.

articles.title: Huge queues as an American fast food giant opens in York city centre
articles.author: Craig Jones
articles.summary: Wendy's, the American fast food giant, launched a new restaurant and takeaway in York city centre on Thursday. To celebrate the opening, Wendy's offered a free beef burger to customers in line before 10:30 am and a free 'frosty' dessert to those queuing.

articles.title: Ultra Experience: Reinventing Tech Possibilities
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Samsung is teasing its next-generation Galaxy Z foldable smartphones, emphasizing a thinner, lighter design with enhanced durability. The new Galaxy Z series will feature improved performance with Galaxy AI integration and an AI-enhanced camera that anticipates user needs, promising a more intuitive and powerful mobile experience.

articles.title: 35 Best Products On Amazon's "Internet Famous" Section
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several companies including Dr. Melaxin with Peel Shot, Lottabody with Coconut Oil Foaming Curl Mousse, Lumify with Eye Drops, Catrice with Instant Awake Under Eye Brightener, L'Oreal Paris with Infallible 3-Second Setting Spray Mist, and La Roche-Posay with Anthelios SPF 40 Tinted Sunscreen, are highlighted for new or popular products. These products have gained recognition for their effectiveness and unique attributes, becoming reviewer favorites.

articles.title: Cyberway Product Innovation Platform: Empowering Enterprise Innovation Processes and Building Exceptional Product Strength
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: Cyberway launched the "Cyberway Product Innovation Platform" to empower FMCG enterprises. The platform offers capabilities in pre-planning insight, in-process control, and post-launch analytics. It aims to enhance product innovation, reduce waste, and shorten R&D cycles.

articles.title: SerpDomains Launches New Marketplace Platform for Premium Aged Domains
articles.author: Serp Domains
articles.summary: SerpDomains has launched a new marketplace platform for buying and selling premium aged domains. The platform enhances the process of acquiring high-value domains for marketers and investors and provides a transparent way for sellers to transact, by vetting every domain through a strict manual review process. The platform offers features like transparent SEO data, fast transactions, expert pricing insights, and exposure to SerpDomains' network of active buyers.

articles.title: Cyberway Product Innovation Platform: Empowering Enterprise Innovation Processes and Building Exceptional Product Strength
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Cyberway Information Technology Co., Ltd. launched the Cyberway Product Innovation Platform. This platform empowers FMCG enterprises by providing AI-powered solutions for product development from ideation to launch. It offers features like AI-driven market opportunity detection, efficient project management, and data-driven innovation strategy optimization.

articles.title: Target, Best Buy, Walmart Stock Updates
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Nintendo launched the Switch 2 console, but availability is currently limited. They are also offering the Mario Kart World bundle, and various Switch 2 accessories like a Pro Controller and cameras. Access to purchase the Switch 2 is primarily through an invite system for eligible Nintendo Switch Online members.

articles.title: Motorola Exchange: Renew Your Phone with Incredible Promotion!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Motorola has launched a new trade-in program, which is part of a growing trend. These programs offer competitive valuations and increased accessibility for consumers looking to upgrade their smartphones. These programs also benefit mobile carriers and manufacturers by boosting sales and enhancing customer loyalty.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 50 fusion discount: Get the device under Rs 12,000 on Flipkart
articles.author: Pratyay
articles.summary: Motorola launched the Edge 50 fusion smartphone in 2024 at Rs 22,999. The phone is now available on Flipkart with discounts, bank offers, and exchange benefits, potentially reducing the price to under Rs 12,000. The smartphone features a Qualcomm Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 SoC, a 50-megapixel main camera, and a 6.67-inch display with a 144 Hz refresh rate.

articles.title: 10 Things That Delighted Us Last Week: From Gap Maxi Dresses to Expanding Floss
articles.author: The Editors
articles.summary: Cotopaxi launched the Allpa 50 backpack with a new design including internal zipper pockets and a removable sling bag. Braun released a hair-removal system using Intense Pulsed Light technology, with positive results reported after initial use. Gap offers a linen-blend maxi dress, recommended for its comfort and style.

articles.title: LED UV Metal Printing Ink, Friction Wearing Color Fastness 5
articles.author: Marina Collins
articles.summary: Wart has launched a new sublimation ink specifically designed for screen printing. The ink boasts high-quality raw materials, compatibility with various printing machines (including EPSON), excellent water and light fastness, and environmentally friendly properties. It is suitable for a wide range of applications, including clothing, teacups, and metal printing, and is compatible with major printer brands like EPSON, Mimaki, and Roland.

articles.title: Cyberway:The Common Choice for Digital Transformation of FMCG Fortune 500 Industries
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Cyberway introduces the Cyber 3A Model, integrating AI technologies for intelligent marketing platforms. Cyberway developed a product innovation collaboration platform tailored to the FMCG sector, pioneering a "Three-Stream Parallel" model. Cyberway offers a mature AI Middle Platform, enabling FMCG companies to focus on business needs.

articles.title: 34 Treats You'll End Up Using Over And Over Again
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Olay launched the Super Serum Body Wash, featuring niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides. Medicube introduced the Turmeric Overnight Wrapping Peel Off Mask with hydrolyzed collagen and vitamin C. Laneige released the Lip Glowy Balm. Oxo launched the compact Cold Brew Rapid Brewer. Beachwaver introduced the B1 Rotating Curling Iron with automatic curling technology.

articles.title: 34 Products That Will Impress When If Nothing Else Does
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Lumify Eye Drops are marketed for their ability to reduce eye redness quickly. EOS Marshmallow "Super Balm" lip treatment is being launched for healing and quality, rivaling other brands. Dr. Melaxin "Peel Shot," exfoliates skin. Kuumba Made is launching Persian Garden fragrance rollerball. Gold Bond is launching firming neck and chest cream, promising visible results in two weeks. The Ordinary is launching Multi-Depth Hydration Serum hydrates and protects skin. Lottabody is launching Coconut Oil Foaming Curl Mousse, designed for hydrated, volumized, frizz-free curls. An unnamed brand has launched a nausea relief inhaler designed for nausea, motion sickness, morning sickness. An unnamed brand has launched an instant foot peeling spray for at-home pedicures. Catrice is launching "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, for concealing dark circles. Burt's Bees is launching a sunburn soother made with aloe and coconut oil to hydrate skin and relieve pain from the sun's rays within just a few hours. Olay is launching Super Serum Body Wash packed with niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides for 24-hour hydration.

articles.title: Dyson Vacuums Are Up to $120 Off Ahead of Amazon Prime Day
articles.author: Clint Davis
articles.summary: Amazon is offering discounts on various Dyson vacuums, including the V11, V8, Ball Animal 3, V15, and Digital Slim. The Dyson V11 is available at its lowest price this year, and the Dyson V8 is offered as an affordable option, while the Dyson Ball Animal 3 is suitable for deep cleaning and pet owners. These discounts are available before Amazon Prime Day.

articles.title: New Look's 'very comfortable' £21 summer dress that's available in 7 colours
articles.author: Leonie Benhamouche
articles.summary: New Look is offering the "Broderie Anglaise V Neck Mini Dress" for £20.99 and "Faux Leather Toe Post Sandals" from £13.79-£17.24. ASOS sells the "ONLY Lace Mini Dress" for £38. Nobody's Child is offering the "Birdie Mini Dress" for between £37 and £45.

articles.title: What do you think about this Mansory G90 BMW M5?
articles.summary: Mansory has introduced the P850 package for the G90-generation BMW M5, which upgrades the engine to 838hp and 1,150Nm of torque. The package also incorporates lightweight carbon fiber body components and cosmetic enhancements, including a unique paint job and a revised exhaust system. Pricing for the P850 package has not yet been disclosed.

articles.title: If You Think You're Out Of Space In Your Home, It's Time To Check Out These 22 Storage Ideas
articles.author: Sally Elshorafa
articles.summary: Several new products are introduced for home organization. These include a silverware tray from Amazon, a shower curtain liner from Maytex (available on Amazon), a battery organizer from Amazon, vacuum storage bags from Amazon, corner sponge organizer from Amazon, slide-on baskets from Amazon, moldable glue from Amazon, corner bookshelf from Amazon, wall-mounted floating bookshelf from Amazon, under-cabinet wineglass rack from Amazon, bedside storage caddy from Amazon, metal platform bed frame from Amazon, adjustable bed risers from Amazon, 3D-printed KitchenAid tool holders, heavy-duty bungees from Amazon, wall-mounted rack from Amazon, fishing rod racks from Amazon, outlet shelf from Amazon and a macrame fruit hammock from macraYAYmacrame.

articles.title: Bobbi Brown's Makeup Hacks: Genius Tips & Tricks!
articles.author: Priya Deshmukh
articles.summary: The beauty industry is moving towards multipurpose makeup products, with manufacturers designing formulas for multiple uses. This trend promotes a mindful approach to beauty, reduces waste, and fosters creativity. This also leads to innovative collaborations between different beauty brands, potentially leading to exciting new products.

articles.title: Nigeria's marketing industry needs structure, investment, and innovation
articles.author: Anthony Nlebem
articles.summary: Bracken Media Solutions aims to redefine marketing using technology, becoming a tech-driven, 360° marketing firm. The company plans to lead innovation in Nigerian marketing and expand its services across Africa and the Middle East. They leverage AI for customer sentiment analysis and campaign optimization, offering clients smarter insights.

articles.title: Dirty Clothes, Clean Fun:  These Laundromats Aren't Just for Laundry
articles.summary: Pearl Lee's Washtub and Launderette are introducing hybrid laundromat models that combine laundry services with social amenities like bars and coffee counters. Pearl Lee's, opened in April 2023, offers a bar and hosts events like live jazz. Launderette focuses on affordability and customer experience, providing a community-focused laundromat service.

articles.title: Dirty Clothes, Clean Fun: These Laundromats Aren't Just for Laundry
articles.author: Alexis Benveniste
articles.summary: Theo DuPree opened Pearl Lee's Washtub in Crown Heights in April 2023, a 'laundrobar' concept combining a laundromat with a bar and community space. The business offers laundry services alongside a bar, live entertainment, and food, creating a social experience and revenue maximization.

articles.title: Solid Max Scam Or Legit{KNOW THE ALL FACTS}-How Solid Max's AI Algorithms Outsmart Market Volatility!
articles.summary: The Solid Max trading platform offers a comprehensive suite of tools for traders, including advanced charting, real-time market data, and customizable indicators. It supports various trading strategies like day trading and swing trading, with features like backtesting and risk management tools to enhance trading performance. Solid Max offers different account types to cater to various trading needs.

articles.title: Solid Max Platform-{LOGIN IT NOW}-The Power of Automation: How Solid Max App Trades for You 24/7!
articles.summary: Solid Max Trading Platform introduces advanced charting and technical analysis tools, real-time market data, and automated trading capabilities to enhance the trading experience. The platform offers mobile trading capabilities and ensures user data security through encryption and protection measures. Algorithmic trading integration enables users to implement complex trading strategies and automate decisions.

articles.title: Uncapped Marketplace set for digital leap as GMSA launches new online platform
articles.author: Shaniya Harding
articles.summary: The Guyana Manufacturing and Services Association (GMSA) is launching a digital platform for its Uncapped Marketplace to connect Guyanese agro-processors and entrepreneurs with local and international markets. The platform, developed in partnership with Mobile Money Guyana (MMG), is currently in testing with 20 vendors and is expected to launch live in about two weeks. The Uncapped initiative already benefits over 100 entrepreneurs and SMEs.

articles.title: SerpDomains Launches New Marketplace Platform for Premium Aged Domains
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: SerpDomains has launched a new marketplace platform for buying and selling premium aged domains. This platform provides a faster, easier, and transparent way to transact, offering benefits such as vetted domains for buyers and exposure to a large network for sellers. The marketplace maintains quality by vetting domains through a strict manual review process, ensuring they meet SEO standards.

articles.title: Best Motorola Phones: Cheap, Beautiful & Top-Rated!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Motorola is focusing on integrating AI into its future phones to anticipate user needs, personalize assistance, and optimize performance. The company is evolving its foldable designs for durability and affordability, while exploring other innovative form factors like rollable displays. Motorola aims to provide premium features at competitive prices, focusing on sustainability and a user-centric approach to solidify its market position.

articles.title: Best Miele washing machines: Top picks for superior cleaning
articles.author: Stuart Pritchard
articles.summary: Miele launched the WQ 1000 WPS Nova Edition washing machine, which features TwinDos, SmartMatic, 23 programs, Wi-Fi connectivity via the Miele@Home app, and an M Touch Pro display. This model boasts a 9kg capacity and 1600rpm spin speed and promises up to 20 years of use.

articles.title: Trump Mobile gold phone will complete my MAGA look
articles.author: Rex Huppke
articles.summary: The Trump Organization is launching a new mobile phone service called Trump Mobile, featuring a (fake) gold smartphone. Eric Trump stated the service is meant to be affordable and reliable for hard-working Americans. A partner in the Trump Mobile operation, Pat O'Brien, said the company will be building phones in America.

articles.title: Samsung email confirms why upgrading your Galaxy phone is a really bad idea
articles.author: David Snelling
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch a new foldable device, potentially named "Galaxy Fold Ultra." Teasers suggest it will feature a normal screen on the front that opens into a tablet-sized display. Rumors indicate that the device will be thinner and more portable than previous models, with improved hardware and AI integration.

articles.title: LG CordZero review: self-emptying vacuum eliminates messy dust clouds
articles.summary: LG has launched the CordZero Auto Emptying Handstick vacuum, priced at $999 (down from $1399). This vacuum features a docking tower for automatic dustbin emptying, and includes features like a spare battery, various attachments, and connectivity to LG's ThinQ app for diagnostics and cleaning history.

articles.title: Is this year the beginning of the end of smartphones?
articles.author: Shweta Taneja
articles.summary: OpenAI acquired Jony Ive's startup io for $6.5 billion to reimagine computer interaction beyond traditional products. Ive and OpenAI are working on AI-first devices with a prototype already built, aiming to move consumers beyond screens into listening devices and cameras to offer an intuitive, immersive digital experience.

articles.title: Software's Zero Cost: A Business Paradox
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: The software industry is experiencing a shift towards zero-cost software, potentially rendering traditional sales models obsolete. Companies are adapting by offering customized support, subscription services, and bundling with hardware, as exemplified by Red Hat's success with Linux support. The freemium model is also gaining traction, enabling users to try basic features for free while offering advanced features via paid subscriptions.

articles.title: I replaced my notes app with ChatGPT — here's how it upgraded my productivity
articles.author: Amanda Caswell
articles.summary: ChatGPT introduced 'memory' and 'Projects upgrade' features. A new 'ChatGPT Record' feature launched for Pro users and Google launched 'Search Live'. These new features enhance the platform's organizational capabilities, allowing users to manage tasks, ideas, and projects more effectively.

articles.title: 'Simply stunning' £136 Boden dress with pockets massively reduced in sale
articles.author: Kelly Ashmore
articles.summary: Boden has significantly reduced the price of their Bria Puff Sleeve Midi Dress, now available for £74.80 (previously £136). The dress, noted for its 'super swishable' skirt, tie belt waist, and pockets, is receiving positive customer reviews praising its comfort, fit, and design.

articles.title: New Look's 'beautiful and delicate' flats are 'so comfy' and reduced in sale
articles.author: Kelly Ashmore
articles.summary: New Look is offering Light Yellow Faux Leather Slingback Flats, a "hybrid of ballet and slingback shoes", for £22.99 online, with sizes four to eight available. The flats, described as 'beautiful and delicate' and 'so comfy' by customers, are made from smooth faux leather with a bow applique and low stacked heel, featuring heel-to-toe padding and a flexible sole.

articles.title: PhilanthroBee Unveils Exclusive Skincare Line Featuring Rare Honey from Bucking Bee Ranch Apiaries
articles.summary: PhilanthroBee launched a new skincare and wellness experience at Bucking Bee Ranch. The immersive experience allows guests to participate in honey harvests, land restoration, and skin rituals. The experience supports the brand's mission to restore ecosystems.

articles.title: Next's new £22 mum and baby beauty box packed with 'everything they need'
articles.author: Kelly Ashmore
articles.summary: Next has launched a new Mother & Baby Essentials Beauty Box priced at £22. The box contains eight products, including full-size items like Nala's Baby 2-in-1 Body Wash & Shampoo and deluxe samples from brands like Clarins and My Expert Midwife, targeting the needs of new mums and babies.

articles.title: Next's 'cool and flattering' £32 dress could be perfect for summer
articles.author: Nicole Haynes
articles.summary: Next has launched the Strappy Shirred Jersey Maxi Dress, available in three colors for £32. Alternatively, New Look offers the Pink Lobster Print Maxi Beach Dress for £29.99. Both dresses are designed for summer wear.

articles.title: Next's 'cool and flattering' £32 dress could be perfect for hot weather this summer
articles.author: Nicole Haynes
articles.summary: Next has introduced the 'Strappy Shirred Jersey Maxi Dress,' priced at £32 and available in three colors. New Look offers an alternative with its 'Pink Lobster Print Maxi Beach Dress' for £29.99. Both dresses are maxi-length, designed for summer or holiday wear.

articles.title: 30 Problem-Solving Walmart Finds To Make Life Easier
articles.author: Rachel Dunkel
articles.summary: The article highlights several newly introduced products, including Apple AirPods Pro 2 known for their noise cancellation, a Shark robot vacuum and mop for effortless floor cleaning, and a nugget ice maker for home use. These products offer innovative features designed to enhance convenience and lifestyle.

articles.title: Ruvo Ala Mask: The World's First AI-Powered Beauty Mask Revolutionizing Makeup Application
articles.summary: Ruvo Ala has launched the Ruvo Ala Mask, an AI-powered makeup mask that applies a full face of makeup in minutes using facial mapping and micro-spray technology. Pre-orders are now open, offering early access and special pricing for this innovative beauty product set to ship in late 2026.

articles.title: Men's Deodorants Available at Myntra Big Brands Bash (18 to 22 June 2025)
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Playboy launched Play It Wild Deodorant Spray with a dynamic blend of citrus, spices, and woody notes. Denver introduced Man Of Steel Drill Deodorant Body Spray featuring aquatic and woody notes for a bold feel. HE launched Power Zero Gas Perfume Body Spray, a gas-free formula with long-lasting freshness. Park Avenue released Good Morning Intense Body Spray, a revitalizing fragrance for a positive start to the day. All these products are available during the Myntra Big Brands Bash.

articles.title: 27 Products With Result Pics That'll Make You Cringe
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: The article showcases several health and beauty products addressing a variety of concerns. These products include Bio-Oil for scars and stretch marks, ear wax removal kits, fungal nail renewal formula, Dermora's foot exfoliation mask, cruelty-free pet ear cleanser, antifungal Wonder Balm, corn remover pads, exfoliating scrub mitt, piercing bump solution, Tend Skin Solution and a nose wax kit.

articles.title: Eufy Smart Display E10 Gives You A Security Cam Overview
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Eufy's new product, the Smart Display S10, is now available for pre-order.

articles.title: The coolest new gadgets making headlines (and outfits)
articles.author: Siddharth Jain
articles.summary: Nike launched the Hyperboot, a battery-powered high-top shoe with heat and dynamic air compression. A new mobile gaming controller offers precision buttons and console-grade vibes, while other introductions include sleek hybrid laptops/tablets, noise-canceling earbuds, and a foldable phone with a full-screen display. Additionally, a mini projector and a health tracker with medical-grade accuracy have been launched, along with a luxe smartphone and stylish charging cables.

articles.title: China's EV powerhouse BYD accelerates into Europe's heartland
articles.author: Moneyweb
articles.summary: BYD has introduced an EV targeted towards the general public.

articles.title: Perplexity\u2019s AI chatbot can now generate videos on X: Here\u2019s how to use it
articles.author: Indian Express
articles.summary: A company (unnamed in the snippet) is introducing or launching a new video generation feature. This feature is expected to provide a boost, implying potential benefits for users or the company itself. Further details on the feature's capabilities and target audience are not available from this limited content.
